title: Vaccination
cleaned_text: Jump to the information you need Vaccinate and Up-to-Date If your child has missed a vital immunization required for summer camp or school, we can help. The Kids Come First health team has launched their Vaccinate and Up-to-Date campaign to tackle just that, and they are taking appointments now. Find out the requirements and [book your child's vaccination](https://www.kidscomefirst.ca/en/kids-come-first/vaccinate-and-up-to-date.aspx) today. Community vaccination clinics Ottawa Public Health offers COVID-19 vaccination through local community clinics and neighbourhood health and wellness hubs which include pediatricians and nurses who have lots of experience vaccinating little ones. Please visit [Ottawa Public Health's website](https://www.ottawapublichealth.ca/en/public-health-topics/covid-19-vaccination-and-children.aspx) for the most up-to-date information or head directly to the [Provincial Booking Portal ](https://covid-19.ontario.ca/book-vaccine/)to book an appointment. You can also call the Provincial Vaccine Booking Line at 1-833-943-3900 (TTY for people who are deaf, hearing-impaired or speech-impaired: 1-866-797-0007).
